Key Match Events: Gudakesh Motie took 4 wickets for 41 runs
Pre-Game Insights: England named four ODI debutants for the first of three matches against the West Indies
England captain Liam Livingstone acknowledged the need to adapt to 50-over cricket
Post-Match Reflections: West Indies skipper Shai Hope praised Evin Lewis's performance
England captain Liam Livingstone emphasized the need to improve in upcoming matches
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was rain-affected and used the Duckworth–Lewis–Stern method to set a revised target
England's more experienced opening pair, Phil Salt and Will Jacks, were dismissed early
